# Troubleshooting RStudio Cloud
Troubleshooting problems w/ RStudio Cloud:

RStudio Cloud is super stable, but occasionally you can run into problems.  This seems to be most common when you have a slow internet connection.

1) Refresh the browser

2) Check that no pop-up blocker is active; disable for RStudio cloud

3) Click out of the project & reload

4) Turn off your wifi & turn it back on

5) Close browser tab &  reload

6) Close browser &  Restart it

7) Explicitly log out of your Cloud account &  log back in

8) Try a different browser (eg, use Firefox if youâ€™ve been using Chrome)

9) Update your browser (download it again, install updates etc).
